__e: Hey, look, any chance of you letting me balance this book on your head?
Couldn't you repay me just a little?
Couldn't you call up to your man there - to stop this...
Could you give me a recipe that works for sure with children?
But if you wouldn't mind, could you just let me read my book?
Hey, if it's not too much trouble, would you mind telling me what the hell is going on?
- Where are you? - In Dallas. I'm sorry, but I was afraid to give my name in case J.R. was there.
Hey, while I'm away, do you think you could... pick up that couch I wanted for the living room?
Would you be kind enough to go outside and remind him what day it is today?
I have studied for ten years, but you have studied for only one month, you can't be so smart!
Couldn't you be a half hour late and stay and talk with us?
Could you be happy with money problems?
I know you're retired and I know that you're busy, but I was thinking if you could help us...
Next time you two go shopping, could you pick us up a washer-drier...
Would you like to come over here and share with us what the paper says.
Well, if it does, would you take him till it's over?
Would you return it for me?
Is there something that you can do to make him spin a little faster?
